text: Smart mouth prick. Love to meet you in real life and trust me I won't soon forget you.

resp.text: This is an online business. Haven't spoken to a customer other than through ebay messages in a year and a half. No clue what you're referring to. Please share with us, so if it is something we did; we can fix the issue. Thank you

name: Spencer Sanders Spencer's Channel

text: I love the selection they have to choose from,  the lamps are gorgeous as well as the photos and mirrors

text: The best around.  So knowledgeable. Great service.

name: Keith Hobbs
text: I love shopping at Yellow House. Greg & Jim and their staff are the best!  I especially love that they can take my finds and turn them in to beautiful lamps.They sell so many unusual pieces of silver that I can buy for gifts, and they have a great selection of antique furniture and accessories too.

name: Gregory Riley
text: We'd very much like to apologize for the experience that Ms. George had.  It is by far, very out of character that such a thing would happen in our store.  We have such great employees, when you come in we're at your service to help with whatever needs you may have.

text: Yellow House Antiques has such a wide range of pieces for the home and their lamp and shade selection is amazing.

name: Julie Roark
text: Nice variety, well displayed. Larger than appears from the outside. Something for everyone.

name: Amy Tadlock
text: I love shopping at this cute little hidden gem. I always seem to find some kind of antique, or home decor that I just couldn't live without. Everywhere you look there is so many wonderful items, and of you don't take your time you will surely miss something great.

name: Sue Evans
text: Love this place. Always a pleasure to shop there. New merchandise is brought in frequently so you're not seeing the same things when you go. They are always so accommodating whether it's to put something on layaway to having them look into ordering something (jewelry) they may be out of. You won't be disappointed.

name: Sharon Bumpers
text: This place is bigger than it looks from the outside. Stocked full of neat and surprising items. Ladies there were super nice and very helpful. Will definitely be back.

name: April Brockmiller
text: I love to see all of the rare items that you don't see any more.a lot of their stuff is too high for most people to afford but they do have some things that are affordable .

name: Ron Steed
text: Nice mix of antique items, many vendors booths.  Very friendly and willing to help

name: Gregory Lee
text: Ton of neat stuff!!!!!!  From antiques to collectables to repurposed furniture. My Wife loves the place and it's one of the few shops that i don't mind going to.

text: Great shop, every thing is displayed to view, price tags were usually visible so no need to wonder and ask. The place is pretty big, I didn't get to look at everything so I will be back.

name: Jerry Persons
text: First class !!!!!, New condos will be first class living , facilities as well....don't believe there will be anything comparable in the downtown area...

name: Stephen Moore
text: We used Atchison Home to furnish our new home-- every rug, lamp and piece of furniture. The quality of their furniture is exceptional and by far the best of the numerous places we visited all over the Gulf Coast before buying. The staff are very knowledgeable, friendly and helpful,.They can put together the perfect look for your house--be it that one piece you are missing or an entire house. I can not say enough about how pleased we were we our experience at Atchison. We'll never go anywhere else. ----

name: Matt Zarzour
text: The quality and style of the Atchison Home product offering is in a league of its own.  Their taste and knowledge of European Antiques makes their store my favorite stop along the gulf coast.

name: Durojaiye olusanya Olatunde
text: Quality work.

name: Stephanie Sprouse
text: Treasure Trove. So glad we found! Worth the drive from where ever you live to this cute & quaint little store. Great friendly management. Best of luck on your treasure hunt.

resp.text: Thank you so much Stephanie! We love seeing the smiles on people face when they find exactly what they weren't looking for😊. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Aquanita McClaney
text: After just one visit, my boyfriend and I are now hooked!  The items are tastefully beautiful and fits our antique/vintage style perfectly.  The staff is friendly and very knowledgeable....can't wait until our next visit to see what other treasures we can find.

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming in to see us and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

resp.text: Thanks so much Wendy! We look forward to seeing (and smelling) you and your candles more often!😁

resp.text: Thank you so much! It was a pleasure serving you as always and hope to see you soon!

name: Saphronia Winkles
text: awesome, awesome, awesome

name: Barry lkard
text: Yes

name: The Schusters
text: I am so happy with the level of customer service I received from Monica over the last several weeks! I called to see if there were any yellow Lady Bank roses in stock yet, but they had not arrived for the season. Monica took my name and number, and said she would call back to let me know when they arrived. Most places wouldn’t even call back, but she called me back a few days later to let me know when they would be in...then the next week or so to tell me they arrived, AND that she picked the best one for me, and put my name on it. I feel like she went above and beyond what most would do, and it meant the world to me. I specifically needed a yellow Lady Banks to replace one that we lost in a move, which was given to us in memory of our miscarriage 6 years ago. Now, I have the prettiest blooms, and am reminded of our sweet angel in heaven...and also how sweet Monica was to get me what I requested! I will keep going back there, for sure!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are very fortunate to have her as our Garden Center General Manager! Hope to see you again soon!

name: Rozlynn Bakes
text: I recently moved to the area and was looking for nursery that sold high quality pottery and plants. I thought the Greenery was lovely and had a great selection.  In my short time here in Owens Cross Roads, I have bought 2 wreaths there and several plants.  About 2 weeks ago on a Saturday, I went there and bought 3 house plants and 2 of the Italian made pots, spending $80 in total. I took them home and 2 of the plants have done great but by the following Thursday the third plant had completely shriveled up and died.  It took me another week to get to the greenery to show them my dead plant. When I brought it to the front counter and showed them the plant, they quizzed me on when I watered it and where I put it and then proceeded to tell me it was a very finicky plant 🌱 and I stated my other plants were fine and hadn’t had a plant die in 4 days ever.  I suggested a replacement but they just made me feel like it was my fault it died so tough luck.  They were not rude but also not helpful.  I walked away from the counter shaking my head.  I feel like with so many competitors and options of places to shop that in the end helping me and switching it out would have been no big deal at all.  It was a $14.99 plant.  In the end, I left deciding to not return to that location.  There are plenty other places to buy plants and pottery.

name: Matt Bowman
text: Top notch staff! Very knowledgeable and helpful. We recently bought several plants and they went out of their way to make sure no dirt got in our car. I would recommend the Greenery over any nursery in this area.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate your kind words! Look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Jeff Barker
text: Best nursery in Huntsville, staff is friendly and knowledgeable. Plants and trees are in terrific shape. For us it is worth the half hour drive.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! We look forward to your next visit!

name: Bryan S. Perry
text: Love it. Beautiful place and nice selection of everything. Felt welcome and definitely be back to visit.

resp.text: Thank so much for your kind words! Looking forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Andrew
text: Huge selection at affordable prices. I got two shrubs there. Staff friendly and educational and gave me a step by step planting guide! Awesome! Lowes and home depot don’t do that!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate you highlighting some of the advantages of shopping at an independently owned garden center! Look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Jennie Couch
text: Great variety of full sun, full shade perennials, trees,shrubs, planters and fountain options. Very knowledgeable and friendly people!

resp.text: Hey Jennie! We appreciate your kind words! We have actively been expanding our perennials and will have even more available for Spring 2022! Look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Kim Price
text: The Greenery has an excellent selection of healthy plants and trees in a beautiful setting. Their plants are priced competitively with the big chain nurseries and their selection and quality are far superior. I love supporting a local business while still getting a great price. And you can't beat the customer service and expertise of the team at the Greenery. Here's a photo of a some flowers I purchased for my flowerbeds and pots.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Bryanna Gowan
text: We went to The Greenery a couple weekends ago to do the pumpkin drip painting class.  We had such a great time! Monica was awesome leading the class and let us be very creative with our painting.  She was very interactive with us throughout the class and even made a cool video of me doing my pumpkin.  We really enjoyed ourselves and look forward to other classes they may offer in the future.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed the class! We are very fortunate to have Monica as our Garden Center General Manager! Thank so much for your kind words!

name: Pam Davis
text: The Greenery is a beautiful business but I recently had a very disappointing experience with them.   I bought a milkweed from them and it grew very well but never bloomed the whole summer.  I called and talked with them and they gave no solution.  I had hoped they would replace it but they just said "well maybe it will bloom later".  We discussed where I planted it and that was not the issue as it grew tall, just no blooms.  In early fall it died suddenly.  I have always liked the greenery for its quality of plants but I was extremely disappointed in their lack of response to my dilemma and absence of trying to satisfy or help a disappointed customer.

resp.text: We very much regret that our customer service did not meet your expectations and for that reason we would like to provide you with a store credit for the amount that you paid for the plant. Our warranty excludes perennials as they can be a little finicky and are often not as long lived as a tree or shrub. On a positive note - if you haven’t already pulled the milkweed up it may very well put back out in the spring as it is normal for them to go dormant in the fall. If it’s gone and you decide to try another milkweed be sure to plant in full sun where there is good drainage.

name: Scott Seeley
text: Excellent selection of plants with unique varieties. The plants are healthy and vigorous, you'll pay a bit more than a box hardware garden center but you'll receive value as the plants will likely perform much better. Plus you know you'll be getting plants that have been proven to grow well here in Huntsville.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your positive and insightful review! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Brad Hobbs
text: Monica was super helpful today! She was very helpful on the telephone. To help with our contactless transaction, she went out and took pics of soil and pansy flowers for me to choose and sent them to my phone. She gave me great advice and help me choose what I needed. Then she loaded the back of my truck when I got to the store. Very great employee! Five stars!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are very fortunate to have her as our Garden Center General Manager!

name: Jamie Giddens
text: Went into The Greenery today for a Christmas present and everything was so beautiful 😍 🎄 Thank you so much to the staff for their wonderful help!

name: Victoria Duncan
text: They had the most beautiful and full orchids. I was able to get one for a doctors gift.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: H S
text: Love this business.  Beautiful merchandise and helpful staff.

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: susan bailey
text: Great variety of trees and shrubs.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Belinda Beard
text: Love the place!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Thomas Webber
text: Beautiful place!!!!! has a wide selection of plants and outdoor and indoor décor. One of my must go to places.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Pam Rowsey
text: Fantastic customer service, never had a plant or tree die.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Robin Bradley
text: Wonderful place

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Isaac Bussey
text:
They started by being understaffed and not being able to get a description of what they have in stock over the phone.
As a landscaper this is a huge detriment, then when I went there to look at stick in person I had to go through 3 people and start over with each one telling them what I wanted and who I was with.
When I finally found a person to help me that is a greenhouse worker we wandered around for a while and they didn’t know where the plant I was looking for was.
Then I find the plant after the greenhouse worker walks past it and doesn’t recognize it.
Then I finally get to the register and they say in order to check out and get a discount for being a landscaper I have to fax in my SLP, which I completely understand, I asked if I could email it after I leave and the employee says yes that’s fine.
I get my SLP and am emailing it and I call them to ask if they can now apply the discount to the order and they say no. They can only apply it to new orders and cannot apply the discount to an old order.

Literally I could take these plants back in there with my receipt and get a refund and then buy them again and I would get the discount.

And no other nursery in the area requires an SLP for the landscapers discount.

Any nursery can sell good plants but it takes a great nursery to have good customer service.

I will literally drive to CatBird Seat in Madison or Indian Creek Nursery on Slaughter road being 25 minutes away before I go here again.

Coming from a landscaper this place was a complete waste of time and the plants at a 20% discount still would have been more expensive then Madison local nurseries.

name: John Briscoe
text: This is a incredible place to buy plants, scrubs etc. Had some problems with some that I purchased they exchanged them with  no hassle warranty was what they said. Very knowledgeable staff.

resp.text: Thanks so much! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Phyllis Hedrick
text: Beautiful healthy plants. Friendly service.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Please let us know what we can do for you to have a five star experience!

name: Arthur Reynolds
text: Very large greenhouse with plenty of plants to choose from. The prices on vegetables was good and fair. They also sell pots and sculptures as well. Very nice people and good customer service.

name: David Hayes
text: This is a great nursery with a large variety of plants. Many hard-to-find items. The staff is knowledgeable and most helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming in and for the great review! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Windy Dobbs
text: I've been to every nursery in NE AL.  Selection, quality, resources and staff are all great.  However, they will not hold up to their 1 year guarantee.  I brought a plant in that had died.  I bought 4 total, 1 didn't make it.  The lady there quickly got on the defensive and stated, we can't take that back in a nasty and rude way.  Then she proceeded to go through a list with me from planting to watering to see if she could find a reason to blame the plant's death on me.  She went with improper watering schedule.  I told her I have an irrigation system.  She asked me how much water it is putting out, I responded, "I don't know the exact output yet, but all the other plants are doing well which is a good indication."  And that was not good enough for her.  So, I just gave up.  It was clearly going to be an issue not worthy of the stress.  BTW:  If you need a tree form ligustrum, Packs Nursery has them for $30 where the Greenery was selling them for $129!!

resp.text: Hi, Windy. I’m very sorry to hear that you had a bad experience when you brought a plant back for replacement under our warranty. We can and will do better than that. Please reach out to us so that we can make it right. You can call me at(256) 518-9836. Thank you, Becky Ray

name: T Pham
text: Such a beautiful nursery and a great store for gifts too. They have air plants and fiddle leaf figs of different prices and sizes!

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed your visit with us! Look forward to seeing you again soon! Thank you!

name: L Paul
text: this is a great nursery!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Tim Free
text: Did a lot of shopping around and this place had all the answers.  Mickey was knowledgeable, helpful, honest and enthusiastic about his trees.   I won’t be going anywhere else for my landscaping needs.

name: Lisa McCollum
text: Pretty good selection of house plants as well as outdoor plants. Interesting home decor and air plants in the inside shop.

name: Marine 3531
text: Staff is always friendly. Seem to be knowledgeable about the product they carry. Never had any issues.

name: Tonya Parker
text: Wonderful place for all your gardening needs.  They are very helpful and knowledgeable!

name: Christina Cain
text: Knowledgeable and courteous staff with a great selection of healthy trees and plants as well as seasonal home decor.

name: Elaine Wooding the Elder
text: They always have a selection of unique and distinct plants, pots and decorative items for the home.

name: Bradley Long
text: Awesome plants, trees, pots and fountains 😀 Friendly and Helpful 👍

resp.text: Hi, Bradley. Thanks so much for stopping by and for the kind words. We love our customers, too!

name: Mickey Carter
text: The best Tree Nursery and Greenhouse with an amazing Home Store in North Alabama.

name: T. Barnes
text: Nice place...they have everything from flowers to trees, mulch to stone and a good selection of statues and water fountains.

name: James Lanza
text: Expensive

name: Sharon D
text: Beautiful place! Prices aren't bad either!

name: bryan johnson
text: Great experience love the staff very informative

name: Debra Waldron
text: My favorite place to shop for unusual items!!!

resp.text: Hi, Debra. Thanks so much for great review. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Brooke Bain
text: Is there a lot of houseplants?

resp.text: Thank you so much for traveling to see us! We are glad you enjoyed your experience and look forward to you visiting again soon!

name: Eve Sweatman
text: Love love love The Greenery!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Eve. We love our customers, too!

name: Gennie S.
text: Beautiful place!

name: Juan Lorenzo
text: Ow 5 ex

name: Gary Grimes
text: Pieces you won't find anywhere else

name: Christine Cole
text:
An amazingly chic, unique, charming, one-of-a-kind gift shop located in the heart of Crestline! Every item in this shop is specially note-worthy; you'll want to see everything, touch everything, then take everything home! From gorgeous antiques to fun gifts, and everything in between- it's like a small excellently curated museum where all the items can be purchased!!!
And the owners are extremely friendly, have great taste and will assist you in finding the perfect gift for children, the person who's impossible to shop for, and even something extraordinary for yourself (like the beautiful jewelry, handbags, or humorous hand-towels, keychains...) Really there is something for EVERYONE here!
Add it to your 'Must-visit' list!

name: Hastings Crockard
text: A must-stop shop in the heart of Crestline. Beautifully curated gifts, art, antiques and furniture!

name: Geoffrey Crane
text: It’s a little Neiman Marcus right in the heart of Crestline!

name: Morgan B
text: We tried to go to Alford Avenue antiques, the first address online was wrong and we ended up at an abandoned building in the middle of nowhere. Tried a second address for Alford and ended up here at the Vintage Shoppes, which come to find out from reading online IS Alford Avenue Antiques. Alford had operating hours posted online which stated they are open until 7,  whereas the Vintage Shoppes apparently close at 5 now. Even still, we got there before 5 and it was already closed, although there was a huge OPEN sign in the window with a tiny in comparison CLOSED sign near it. Altogether frustrating experience, store might be fine we wouldn’t know.

resp.text: Since COVID, Updating the hours across the Internet has been a challenge. Thank you for taking the time to visit The Vintage Shoppes today and we hope that you can find time to visit again in the future. Once inside, you will find curated spaces by Alford Avenue antiques as well as other vendors throughout the space. Sorry that your Experience today made you give one star. The vendors at the vintage Shoppes work very diligently to provide good merchandise and good service to shoppers. We would all like to think we are far better than one star and hope that you would reconsider your rating of this small business.

name: laurie lawson
text: Fun vintage shops with great lighting and a plethora of merchandise. It is all displayed in a way that is not overpowering and the store is designed that walking through the little rooms make you feel like you are discovering treasures at every turn. In fact we discovered and purchased this adorable vintage hat for my niece.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting today. Customers like you and others we welcome at The Vintage Shoppes are the lifeblood of a small business.  We appreciate the warm review. Thank you. Please come again soon! Enjoy the hat! #ShopSmall

name: Katrina Hunkapiller
text: Very unique, gorgeous selection to fit any home/style for great prices! Loved how organized it was and the art gallery/furniture store set up and design. I went to find another item to meet the $20 minimum to pay with card and ended up going home with two items I love!

resp.text: Katrina, thank you so much for taking the time to visit today. The Vintage Shoppes and it’s Vendor’s work diligently to ensure our guests have a wonderful shopping experience. Times are challenging now and every transaction and every customer visit is extremely important. Thank you for being an important part of our survival. Thank you so very much for taking the time to support this small business. Stay safe!

name: Sherika Heard
text: I visited this place with my husband and small child, I was highly satisfied with my purchase but my husband felt that the customer service did not come off as pleasant. He was asked for an ID for a $20 purchase which he felt was unnecessary. Without inquiring about why we had to show ID, the cashier began to state that it was mandatory for all card purchases. Unfortunately my husband does not feel comfortable spending any more money at this store.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing. Apologies if the delivery of our ID requirement could have been softer. There is a sign posted at the register alerting shoppers that purchases must be greater than $20 to swipe and the name on the card must match your photo ID. As retailers we prevent fraud far more often than many consumers realize and we take every precaution to prevent it from happening at The Vintage Shoppes. It is unfortunate that you decided that our commitment to your security warranted 3 stars. This small business deserves more than 3 stars just as you deserve for every small shop to regard security as high as sales. For the same reason your husband “does not feel comfortable” shopping in The Vintage Shoppes, there are many more who shop with us because they appreciate our diligence.  This small business appreciates you as we wish you safety, blessings and prosperity.

name: Lynda Pierce
text: Great experience shopping today. Much more everything than I expected. Great selection, great prices, great pieces. Could not bring anything home today but I am still thinking about my visit so I guess I will return tomorrow to purchase something I had my eye on. Most places like this are a little grimy but not this one. It’s a new place in my rotation!

name: Theresa LoRusso
text: Really rude staff at the front register. Place itself is cute but they need to hire someone more welcoming for sure.

name: Jillian Everett
text: The store is absolutely beautiful and has some really amazing items. I spent quite a while in the shop today and found two perfect Christmas presents for family. When I took my items to the counter, I told the associate how amazing the store was and that this was my very first time seeing it. However, the items I got didn’t ring up to $20, so I was told they would only take cash or I couldn’t make the purchase. Only all I had on me was credit cards and I had an afternoon appointment so I didn’t have time to go to an atm and come back. I’m really disappointed. It would be nice for first time customers to get a little grace on the first purchase since I had no idea I would need to bring cash. Or maybe have more signage around the store? The only sign was at the checkout counter and the writing was so small, I didn’t notice it until I was finished shopping.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking time to visit the store. As with any business The Vintage Shoppes has a minimum of $20 for us to swipe anything which is posted in a nice little frame at the register. It’s unfortunate that this upset you so that you have given the place three stars because of that but we hope that you might come and visit us again in the future. Small businesses have to take steps of this manner to keep it going one more day. This small business appreciates your support.

name: Shea B.
text: This place is fantastic! It's so clean and organized, the staff is super friendly, and you could go through the store three times and still find new stuff. Definitely recommend

resp.text: Thank you so very much for visiting with us! Our vendors work diligently to make each experience a fun one. Your kind words are a pat on the back for all involved. This small business appreciates support and encouragement from you and customers like you. Have a great day and please visit again soon.

name: Kim Cornett
text: Nice merchandise, nice owner. I had a somewhat unpleasant first impression of the staff, but the owner reached out immediately and made me feel better about my visit. The atmosphere, merchandise, and owner are enough for me to return.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to provide service. We will never be perfect but will will always appreciate the opportunity to provide good, better and best services to our customers. Again, thank you for your feedback.

name: Robin Ferguson
text: Found a pair of gorgeous candle holders today. The owners and staff are always friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so very much for taking the time to both visit the store front and leave a review. Sometimes people have a good experience somewhere and they don’t have time to leave a review but you made time to review us and we really appreciate it...thank you! Our vendors are very sincere about curating great items at great prices. We’re making changes every day and working on ways to Expand our offerings and appeal to new people and keep it interesting for repeat supporters each day. Thank you for your purchase. Please follow us on Instagram and Facebook. This small business appreciates your support.  Have a great day.

name: JewelryCash ByMail
text: The jewelry is great. Something for everyone. More fine jewelry selections needed. We may consign some with them. The staff is uncommonly friendly.

resp.text:
Thank you for the feedback on the jewelry. We are eager to implement your suggestions!
Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Sandra P
text: Department store style antique mall selection with affordable marketplace prices! Beautiful, convenient space to shop. Definitely a must see!

resp.text: This small business appreciate your support.

name: Connie Schweigert
text: Warm, helpful staff. Big selection, artfully displayed.

resp.text: Thank you so very much for complementing our staff. Our selection is expanding each day. Since we haven’t been open very long we’re still getting the hang of things but supporters like you are helping us understand what items you seek and vendors are working diligently to curate those items as well as unique items you may not even realize you need. Haha. This small business appreciates your support.

name: Hiram Jessup
text: Just happened to go in and found most of what my son needed for his new apartment. This place is a hidden gem. Excellent merchandise and prices.

resp.text: You and your family were such fun! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Merritt Smith
text: Beautiful shop with a unique and wide variety of decor/furniture and jewelry and many other things!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Drew Barnes
text: Loved my Shopping experience at The Vintage Shoppes. Reasonable prices and a broad spectrum of history to re- love.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Sophie Franklin
text: This business has scammed so many people out of money.  She promotes under various business names (she will introduce herself under Signature Estate Sales but ask you to pay her under Alford Avenue Antiques and now this!). She does this, so that consumers are unable to find reports of her frauding others.  She he does not pay you what you are owed or she will not pay you at all. She makes up prices at the register because her employees don't know how to price items.  Her employees are also very unprofessional and she blames them for whenever something goes wrong.  It is not the employees fault, but the business owner should be held responsible. Her estate sales are very unorganized, and you will find consistent reviews noting this as well. Please if you are working with Signature Estate Sales, please note that you are also working with Alford Avenue Antiques and NOW The Vintage Shoppes, where you will find she has scammed many indivduals who did not know she was operating under two (now three) different business names. She must be stopped from deceiving others before this all goes too far. I feel sorry for anyone who has fell victim to her scams.

name: Angelia Harrison
text: I did not get a chance to look for long. But i was very impress with the lady that work there very nice and friendly

resp.text: Thank you so very much for taking the time to peruse the store. All of the vendors work very diligently to keep it nice. Thank you for the compliment of the front desk team member because Nothing happens without them. We look forward to your next visit! Please join us for our Christmas Party Sale, Sunday, Dec. 15, 12:30-4:30. Santa will be at the store taking photos with adults and children! Refreshments, door prizes, discounts and fun!

name: Sassafras Market and Coffee
text: OMG ...Amazing place!!!  Shopping here first from now on. Terrific prices.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers..enjoy the coffee mugs!

name: Stephanie Frakes
text: 1st time in, Butter Bean vintage section is my favorite!

resp.text: Stephanie thank you so much for visiting! Butter Bean Vintage is a great shoppe...and there are more to explore as well. This small business appreciates your support. Thank you for sharing your experience with others.

name: Susan B
text: Found a one of a kind piece...

resp.text: Susan, the vendors at The Vintage Shoppes greatly appreciate you “shopping small.” It’s icing on the cake that you found something you loved enough to purchase. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Please join us for our open house, Tuesday, November 12th from 4-6:30. This small business appreciates YOU!

name: ty den
text: I could spend forever here

resp.text: Thank you so very much. Hopefully you found a treasure that you made your own. We appreciate you visiting and taking the time to share your experience. Like many small businesses, we are struggling with a smile. It is only supporters like you who keep us going and looking forward to light at the end of the tunnel. Thank you for your support of this small business. Please keep shopping small. Kisses and hugs! The Vintage Shoppes

name: Jobaida Akther
text: There are many items but the price seems to be very high compared to other used product shops.

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us. Most of our customers find our prices to be very affordable for their condition and age. We hope that you will continue to visit the individual vendor booths throughout the store and find even more great items within your budget. Thank you for your support of this small business.

name: purplebananas
text: Ok selection but overall overpriced and limited.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting the Shoppe. It’s unfortunate you didn’t have five star experience. Most customers find our prices and selection to be quite good but for those seeking more of a thrift store pricing scheme, their needs will likely not be met. The vendors take great pride in sourcing the items they present and for small business that comes at a slightly higher rate. Thank you for shopping small and trying out the Vintage Shoppes. Please consider visiting again and perhaps we will have something that is more to your liking. Have a wonderful day.

name: Carl Cathey
text: Cool place with a great selection

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to support a small business, Carl! We are glad you enjoyed the store. Our vendors And store team work very hard to create positive customer experiences. Please visit again soon! Have a great weekend.

name: Angie Cacioppo
text: Interesting shopping

resp.text: Angie, thank you for taking the time to comment on the Shoppe! It is a labor of love for everyone involved and we strive to ensure that shoppers like you have an experience that is interesting, memorable, neat, clean and organized so that you will want to return. Thank you so much for your support of this small business. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Deb Paradise
text: Absolutely amazing place.

name: Linda Mathews
text: They do awesome work!

resp.text: Thankyou!

name: Roy Davis
text: Every time I have gone to this shop I have found something I liked.  I have found the prices here quite affordable. My wife and  I have had them refinish several pieces of furniture too.

resp.text: Thankyou Roy for your business! Come back and see us soon!

name: Cecelia Wilson
text: Small but many unique and interesting items.   Friendly folks.

resp.text: thank you so much Cecelia! Thank you for coming to our Grand Opening celebration and our Dixie Belle Paint class! We enjoy our customers! We would love to have a bigger store! But Big things come in small packages! Quality items and exceptional customer service is our goal! We want all our customers to feel like family!

name: Sharon Bumpers
text: Great painting class!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Sharon! Can't wait to see you again for our next class! we love our customers!

name: Cee Dupree
text: Absolutely love this place. The ladies are very nice. Some great antique pieces at a very reasonable price. You will not leave empty handed. We will definitely be back to visit this little shop next time we are in the area.

name: Jim Puckett
text: Small shop with limited items.

name: Susan Harding
text: Not open on Wednesday at 11:00am  We were here in January, so possibly the posted hours are seasonal.  It was not a totally wasted journey, as there are other little shops in the area.

name: Sharise Griggers
text: I  have  been here and it's reasonably priced and the selection of different items is great! The woman that runs it was so sweet!

name: Paul Wimmer
text: Love this place great deals!  Valerie the owner is Great!
